name: Clue Classic
storyline: Solve the classic mystery of the Clue game in its interactive iteration for Windows. Explore the digital version of the Tudor Mansion to determine who killed Mr. Boddy by exploring specific areas, determining the positions and activities of suspects, etc.
summary: Clue Classic is a video game based on Hasbro's Cluedo franchise. It was developed by Games Cafe and published by Reflexive Entertainment on June 3, 2008. The single-player interactive game was inspired by the artwork in the 2002/2003 Classic Detective Game version, featuring the original six characters, weapons and nine original rooms. Producer was Rob Adams, designer was Rob Adams, programmer was Chad Sterling, lead Artist was Erin Miller, and Music & Sound was by Staffan Melin and David Chan.
